title: 申請指定建築物預鑄率評定專業機構規費收費標準
title_en: Fee-charging Standards for the Application of Designated Professional Institutions for Building Precast Rate Evaluation
short_name: Fee-charging Standards for the Application of Designated Professional Institutio
description: Official legislation text from Taiwan Laws & Regulations Database. Category: 行政＞內政部＞建築研究目. Articles extracted: 4.

provisions.title: 第 1 條
provisions.content: 本標準依規費法第十條第一項規定訂定之。

provisions.title: 第 2 條
provisions.content: 申請指定建築物預鑄率評定專業機構者，每件應繳納規費新臺幣一萬五千元。

provisions.title: 第 3 條
provisions.content: 前條所定規費經繳納後，有溢繳或誤繳情形，依規費法相關規定辦理。
